mapper.select: select b.BOOKING_NUM, b.USER_NUM, b.ROOM_NUM, CHECK_IN_, CHECK_OUT, PAYTYPE, PAYMENT, ADULT, KID, USER_KORNAME, ROOM_TYPE, NUSER_KORNAME from ((BOOKINGS b left JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_NUM=b.USER_NUM) left JOIN rooms r on b.ROOM_NUM=r.ROOM_NUM) left JOIN NONE_USERS n on b.BOOKING_NUM=n.BOOKING_NUM where b.BOOKING_NUM like '%' || #{value} || '%' ORDER BY b.BOOKING_NUM DESC

select BOOKING_NUM, BOOKINGS.USER_NUM, BOOKINGS.ROOM_NUM, CHECK_IN_, POINT, CHECK_OUT, PAYTYPE, PAYMENT, ADULT, KID, USER_KORNAME, ROOM_TYPE from USERS, ROOMS, (select * from BOOKINGS where BOOKING_NUM=#{bookingNum}) BOOKINGS where USERS.USER_NUM=BOOKINGS.USER_NUM and BOOKINGS.ROOM_NUM=ROOMS.ROOM_NUM

select NONE_USERS.BOOKING_NUM, NUSER_NUM, BOOKINGS.ROOM_NUM, CHECK_IN_, CHECK_OUT, PAYTYPE, PAYMENT, ADULT, KID, NUSER_KORNAME, ROOM_TYPE from NONE_USERS, BOOKINGS, ROOMS where NONE_USERS.BOOKING_NUM=#{bookingNum} and NONE_USERS.BOOKING_NUM=BOOKINGS.BOOKING_NUM and BOOKINGS.ROOM_NUM=ROOMS.ROOM_NUM order by BOOKING_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into BOOKINGS(BOOKING_NUM, USER_NUM, ROOM_NUM, CHECK_IN_, CHECK_OUT, PAYTYPE, PAYMENT, ADULT, KID, POINT) values(#{bookingNum}, #{userNum}, #{roomNum}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{paytype}, #{payment}, #{adult}, #{kid}, #{bookingPoint})
insert into ACCOUNTS(BOOKING_NUM, BANK, ACCOUNT) values(#{bookingNum}, #{bank}, #{account})
insert into CARDS(BOOKING_NUM, CARD_COM, CARD_NO, CARD_EXP, INSTALLMENT) values(#{bookingNum}, #{cardCom}, #{cardNo}, TO_DATE(#{cardExp}, 'MM/YYYY'), #{installment})

insert into NONE_USERS(NUSER_NUM, NUSER_EMAIL, NUSER_KORNAME, NUSER_LASTNAME, NUSER_FIRSTNAME, NUSER_BIRTH, NUSER_PHONE, BOOKING_NUM) values(NUSERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nuserEmail}, #{nuserKname}, #{nuserLastName}, #{nuserFirstName}, TO_DATE(#{nuserBirth}, 'YYMMDD'), #{nuserPhone}, #{bookingNum})
mapper.select: select count(*) from bookings where SUBSTR(to_char(BOOKING_NUM), 0, 6) like to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD')
